title: Laptop Not Charging
description: Fix laptop battery not charging or power adapter issues.

steps.title: Check Power Connections
steps.instruction: Ensure power adapter is firmly plugged into both the wall outlet and laptop. Check for any loose connections or damaged cables.

steps.title: Try Different Power Outlet
steps.instruction: Plug the charger into a different wall outlet to rule out electrical socket issues. Avoid using power strips if possible.

steps.title: Inspect Charging Port
steps.instruction: Check laptop's charging port for any debris, dust, or damage. Clean gently with compressed air if needed.

steps.title: Remove and Reseat Battery (if removable)
steps.instruction: Shut down laptop, remove battery, press power button for 15 seconds, reinsert battery, and try charging again.

steps.title: Update Battery Driver
steps.instruction: Device Manager → Batteries → Microsoft ACPI-Compliant Control Method Battery → Right-click → Uninstall → Restart computer (driver will reinstall).
